casebody.data:
99-0391 (La. 4/1/99)

UNIVERSAL GUARANTY INSURANCE v. RIVERSIDE ASSOCIATES and Robert L. Marrero, Trustee. No. 99-CC-0391. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Riverside Associates et al; Marrero, Robert L. Trustee; — Defen*555dant(s); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs; Parish of Jefferson 24th Judicial District Court Div. “P” Number 498-918; to the Court of Appeal, Fifth Circuit, Number 98-CW-1220

Denied.

CALOGERO, C.J. not on panel.
